title: Large-Scale Self-Directed Mathematics Inquiry Program for Gifted and Advanced Students

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental arithmetic operations and comprehension of basic mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Utilizes smartphone-based simple content, with periodic feedback sessions between teachers and students

learning_goals: Learners can independently select an inquiry topic within two weeks and develop a step-by-step learning plan
Learners enhance their ability to revise strategies during problem-solving through at least three self-assessments
Learners prioritize intrinsic curiosity over external motivation as the primary driver when performing project-based tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
